products.title: Fustian Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: Straightforward simplicity is sometimes the best way to express your style, and this fustian pumice roman blind is a great example of how that can work. The traditional weave and soft, neutral grey (can we see the merest hint of mushroom in the shade, maybe?) make for a versatile straightforward simplicity is sometimes the best way to express your style, and this fustian pumice roman blind is a great example of how that can work.

products.title: Radiance Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: This eye-catching embroidered pattern creates a stunning visual effect that jumps out, giving great movement and interest to the fabric. The radiance pumice natural roman blind is made up of tiny diamonds in a flowing pattern of oval shapes. This graphic in an earthy natural hue has a bohemian vibe that will look great within an eclectic or retro styled space. Product id: db-rom1063 fabric colour: pumice material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Glencoe Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: What a luxurious little specimen this is. Richly woven and deeply textured fabric that you just want to reach out and touch, in the ever-luxurious form of a roman blind. This is matched by the earthy, rustic shade that strikes a balance between cool grey and soft neutral, making what a luxurious little specimen this is.
